alert.note: Alert for Irion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 7:19AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Crockett and south central Irion Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 719 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Barnhart, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Crockett and south central Irion Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
